This is a very good point and one I was wondering myself. From ```segway-internal```:


```
#!html

>I think setting a variance floor is reasonable in all cases, although it will likely only matter for GMM. It should only come up in the edge case where EM tries to push the variance to 0, so the actual value should not matter as long as it is small and nonzero -- I think 0.001 is reasonable.

```
